text: Park Dong-ju (, also transliterated Park Dong-joo, born 27 March 1963) is a South Korean equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of South Korea Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Park Dong-ju
